GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
ASoC: codecs: va-macro: fix accessing array out of bounds for enum type

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 4a799972a283ab4ec031041304d7e2d34e1a16eb, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 908e6b1df26efc9d2df70c9a7bf4f5eae5c5702f. For more details please see the references link.
